message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: I'm curious about the market shares of different North America burger brands. Could you provide me the total restaurants number of McDonald’s, Burger King, Wendy’s, Shake Shack, and KFC stores worldwide, and in New York, Detroit, and Seattle as of the end of 2024? Please obtain the information from relevant financial reports. If the information is not available, mark it as "nan".

Please present the organized data in one Markdown table format.
The  columns  names are as follows:
Brand, Worldwide, New York, Detroit, Seattle

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the column without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To get the accurate data, I need to find out the latest financial reports or market share reports that mention the number of restaurants for these brands globally and in specific cities.

<search>total restaurants number McDonald's Burger King Wendy's Shake Shack KFC worldwide New York Detroit Seattle</search>

Search query: total restaurants number McDonald's Burger King Wendy's Shake Shack KFC worldwide New York Detroit Seattle
Result: [Doc 1](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_the_largest_fast_food_restaurant_chains):
List of the largest fast food restaurant chains - Wikipedia This is a list of the largest fast-food restaurant chains by their number of locations in the world.

[Doc 2](https://www.scrapehero.com/location-reports/10-largest-food-chains-in-the-usa/):
10 Largest food chains in the United States in 2026 - ScrapeHero Starbucks has 16,854 and McDonald's has 13,794 locations in the US. These three together make 48.01% of the largest 10 food chains in the US.

[Doc 3](https://www.foodindustry.com/articles/top-50-fast-food-chains-in-the-u-s/):
Top 50 Fast Food Chains in the U.S. - FoodIndustry.Com Notes about the Top 5 Performers · 1. McDONALD'S · 2. STARBUCKS · 3. CHICK-FIL-A · 4. TACO BELL · 5. WENDY'S.

Based on the available information:

<search>McDonald’s Burger King Wendy’s Shake Shack KFC New York Detroit Seattle</search>

Search query: McDonald’s Burger King Wendy’s Shake Shack KFC New York Detroit Seattle
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.facebook.com/groups/366370344212821/posts/2158761864973651/):
Which Fast-Food Nuggets Are Superior? MCDONALD'S WENDY'S ... Never had nugs from KFC or shake shack...I personally like mine crispy so im going mcdonalds, then wendys then burger king, ...

Chain Restaurants - Eater Every major fast-food chain, it seems, now has its own app promising deals, discounts, and a better diner experience overall.
